title: MARINANOW_BANDO R&S
abstract: MARINANOW SERVICES 3.0. THE PROJECT AIMS TO BECOME A TRANSNATIONAL HUB IN THE NAUTICAL MARKET, AIMING TO INCREASE PROFITABILITY AND PROMOTE THE TERRITORY THROUGH THE MARINANOW.COM PLATFORM. THE RESULT OF GROWTH IN THE VOLUME OF BUSINESS WILL DERIVE FROM THE ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE PROJECT TO TARGHETTISE CUSTOMERS, PROVIDE PORTS, CHARTER COMPANIES, SERVICE AGENCIES, AND HOTELS OF THE MEDITERRANEAN AREA WITH A COMPLETE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM. THIS SYSTEM WILL BE IMPLEMENTED AS A TECHNOLOGICAL PLATFORM THAT WILL ALLOW YOU TO DIGITISE DOCUMENT EXCHANGES NECESSARY FOR RECREATIONAL VESSELS FOR THE ENTRY AND EXIT PHASE, TO BOOK A BERTH AND TO BOOK AVAILABLE BOATS IN REAL TIME. THE PLATFORM WILL ALLOW YOU TO ENTER ALL THE SERVICES THAT REVOLVE AROUND THE SECTOR WHICH WILL BE EASILY INTERCEPTED AND BOOKABLE WITH A CLICK DIRECTLY FROM THE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM

motivations: There is a need to increase profitability and promote the territory in the nautical market.
Current management systems for recreational vessels, ports, charter companies, and hotels in the Mediterranean area are inefficient and require digital transformation.
objectives: Establish a transnational hub in the nautical market through the Marinanow.com platform.
Develop an artificial intelligence-powered management system to target customers and provide a comprehensive digital solution for the nautical sector.
Digitize document exchanges and enable real-time booking for berths and boats.
methods: Implement a technological platform to support the digital management system.
Utilize artificial intelligence to target customers and enhance the platform's functionality.
Integrate various services related to the nautical sector into the platform for easy access and booking.
results: Increased profitability and growth in the volume of business for the nautical market.
Improved efficiency and streamlined processes for ports, charter companies, service agencies, and hotels.
Enhanced customer experience through real-time booking and digitized document exchanges.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of a digital management system for the nautical market using artificial intelligence

motivations: There is a need for a transnational hub in the nautical market to increase profitability and promote territories.
The nautical industry lacks a comprehensive management system for ports, charter companies, service agencies, and hotels in the Mediterranean area.
The industry requires a digital platform for document exchanges, berth booking, and real-time boat availability.
objectives: Develop MARINANOW SERVICES 3.0 as a transnational hub in the nautical market.
Implement a complete management system for various stakeholders in the nautical industry using artificial intelligence.
Create a technological platform for digitizing document exchanges, berth booking, and real-time boat availability.
methods: Use artificial intelligence to target customers and increase business volume.
Develop a technological platform for digitizing necessary document exchanges for recreational vessels.
Implement a management system that allows booking of berths and available boats in real time.
results: Increase profitability and promote territories through the MARINANOW.COM platform.
Provide a comprehensive management system for various stakeholders in the nautical industry.
Facilitate easy booking and interception of services in the nautical sector.
openai_json.research_subject: Development of a transnational hub in the nautical market using artificial intelligence

motivations: The nautical market lacks a comprehensive digital platform that integrates port management, charter services, and related hospitality services in the Mediterranean area.
Document exchanges and booking processes for recreational vessels are inefficient and need digitalization to improve operational efficiency.
objectives: Create a transnational hub for the nautical market through the MARINANOW.COM platform to increase profitability and promote Mediterranean territories.
Develop an AI-powered management system that digitizes vessel documentation, berth booking, and service reservations for ports, charter companies, and related businesses.
methods: Implement artificial intelligence technology to target and segment customers in the nautical market.
Build a technological platform that digitizes document exchanges for vessel entry/exit procedures and enables real-time booking capabilities.
Integrate multiple nautical sector services into a unified management system accessible through single-click functionality.
results: Increased business volume and profitability for nautical sector stakeholders in the Mediterranean area.
Streamlined operations through digitized documentation and real-time booking capabilities for berths, boats, and related services.
Enhanced territorial promotion and improved customer experience through an integrated digital platform.
anthropic_json.research_subject: AI-powered digital platform for integrated nautical market services and management
